title: The Intelligence - “Abiy risks rolling Ethiopia into another pointless, hellish war”—Ethiopia’s looming civil war
summary:
Also on the daily podcast: super-chickens and self-reliance in China, and the books bound with human skinPRIME MINISTER ABIY AHMED has taken drastic steps to quieten a state stacked with trained militias.
The conflict could draw in more states—or the whole of the Horn of Africa.
China’s increasing push for self-reliance in a globalised economy has its complications—made clear by a vast influx of precision-bred super-chickens.
And the macabre tale of books bound with human skin.
